How to Order IMF Publications

You can order IMF publications through our online Bookstore, or you can order via mail, phone or fax.

IMF e-Bookstore

The easiest way to order IMF publications is online at www.imfbookstore.org. The site offers users the ability to browse the entire catalog of IMF publications and purchase titles in print and mobile formats. We accept payments by credit card (American Express, MasterCard, and Visa).

IMF eLibrary

The IMF eLibrary delivers the IMF’s publications, research, analytical papers, reports, and data as a one-stop resource for IMF content. You will find no more trusted or respected authority on global economic information and thought leadership. Various electronic formats, full-text searching, citation and sharing tools, and more will make the site a valuable asset in your own work. For institutional subscription information and free trials, contact asmith2@imf.org. Individual subscriptions may be purchased through the IMF Bookstore.

Mail or Fax

For further information about ordering IMF publications, please visit the IMF Bookstore's "How to order" page, or address inquiries to:

International Monetary Fund
Publications Services,
PO Box 92780
Washington, D.C. 20090, U.S.A
Telephone: (202) 623-7430
Fax: (202) 623-7201
E-mail: publications@imf.org
Web: www.imfbookstore.org
